name: datatypeproperty to class
baseQuery:
SELECT ?x WHERE 
	{ 
		?x a test:A .
		?x test:hasValue STRING_VALUE .
		?x test:hasValue ?y.
		FILTER(datatype(?y)=xsd:string) .
	}
mapping:
BASE <http://www.symbiote-h2020.eu/ontology/semanticmapping/testModel#>
	PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>

	RULE 
		CONDITION CLASS :A 
			:hasValue TYPE xsd:string  
		PRODUCTION CLASS :B
